Package com.xebisco.yield

Interface Renderable

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractRenderable, AnimationPlayer, AudioPlayer, BlankScene, BoxCollider2D, ChangeSceneTransition, CircleCollider2D, Collider2D, ComponentBehavior, DistanceJoint2D, EdgeCollider2D, EmptyRenderable, Entity2D, Entity2DContainer, Joint2D, PhysicsBody, RectangleMesh, RevoluteJoint2D, Scene, TextMesh, TexturedRectangleMesh
public interface Renderable
Represents an object that can be rendered by a Renderer.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    render(Renderer renderer)
    Renders the object using the provided Renderer.

  • Method Details

    • render

      void render(Renderer renderer)
      Renders the object using the provided Renderer.
      Parameters:
      renderer - The renderer to use for rendering the object.
